L

login(String, String, String, double, double) - Method in class taxi.service.LoginService
login Method, applicable for both Taxi Driver and Customer This method gets as parameters: the usertype (Customer or Taxi Driver) the username the password the latitude and the longtitude The method: Checks whether the usertype is customer or taxi driver Fetches from the appropriate table the customer or taxi driver object having the given username.
LoginInfo - Class in taxi.resource
The LoginInfo class implements the xml representation of a login (for customer or taxi driver), needed from LoginResource Every LoginInfo has: username, password, lat, lon
LoginInfo() - Constructor for class taxi.resource.LoginInfo
Default constructor
LoginInfo(String, String, double, double) - Constructor for class taxi.resource.LoginInfo
The main constructor
LoginResource - Class in taxi.resource
LoginResource class implements the REST service for LoginService The base path for this class is /login
LoginResource() - Constructor for class taxi.resource.LoginResource
 
LoginService - Class in taxi.service
The LoginService class implements the functions regarding customer and taxi driver login.
LoginService() - Constructor for class taxi.service.LoginService
